alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Hudson; Western Bergen; Western Essex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:55PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT FAIRFIELD...WEST CENTRAL NEW HAVEN...HUDSON...EASTERN PASSAIC...BERGEN...NORTHERN ESSEX... PUTNAM...QUEENS...BRONX...ROCKLAND...WESTCHESTER...NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) AND NORTHWESTERN NASSAU COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1055 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Carmel to near Ossining to Fairfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Paterson and Paramus around 1100 PM EDT. Danbury and Passaic around 1105 PM EDT. Stamford and Hackensack around 1110 PM EDT. Yonkers and White Plains around 1115 PM EDT. Ridgefield and Riverdale around 1120 PM EDT. Port Chester and Newtown around 1125 PM EDT. Norwalk and New Rochelle around 1130 PM EDT. RFK Bridge and City Island around 1135 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for southern Connecticut...northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.
